pkgmetadata.longdescription: # cython_bboxcython_bbox is widely used in object detection tasks. To my best knowledge, it was first implemented in [Faster-RCNN](https://github.com/rbgirshick/py-faster-rcnn). Since then, almost all object detection projects use the source code directly.In order to use it in standalone code snippets or small projects, I make it a pypi module. The `cython_bbox.pyx` is totally borrowed from [Faster-RCNN](https://github.com/rbgirshick/py-faster-rcnn). Thanks [RBG](http://www.rossgirshick.info/)!## install```pip install cython_bbox```## usage```from cython_bbox import bbox_overlapsoverlaps = bbox_overlaps( np.ascontiguousarray(dt, dtype=np.float32), np.ascontiguousarray(gt, dtype=np.float32) )```
